$meta.description: Generally there are no restriction in regards of which service runs on which port but there are some default ports for each service. Here a list of the most common ports: 21 (FTP), 22 (SSH), 25 (SMTP), 80 (HTTP), 141 (SQL), 8080 (HTTP), 1222 (RSHELL), 1542 (Repository), 3306 (SQL), 3307 (SQL), 3308 (SQL), 6667 (Chat), 37777 (CCTV)

port_number.description: Returns the `number` which is used for the port.

is_closed.description: Returns `true` if this port is closed, `false` if the port is open.

get_lan_ip.description: Returns a `string` containing the local IP address of the computer to which the port is pointing to.
returns: print("Port " + port.port_number + " is pointed to " + port.get_lan_ip + "!")
